message.body: How are you how are you? Do you need anything? I lost track of you. :( First I was giving you a week not to be crazy drugged and groggy but then I started school and got swept beneath the tide of that so I lost you for a second.
When I saw you this am I was headed to the follow up from the surgery. I am doing well and now am in the phase of feeling good so can't overdo!!!!
I will come sit near you and encourage you not to dance?
Lolol oh no I am dancing!!!
Tell me if you want company. My schedule is wacko but I will gladly make time for you. You're awesome, and I'm glad I know you.
If you want reiki sometime, I would gladly do that. It has the added benefit of keeping you immobilized. Lol
Lolol then no reiki for me! Just check your time and when you want tea...let me know
How is Thursday morning around 11:30? I need to leave for school around 1ish.
ne but we have to be there 9:30 or so. If you are free at 10 on 5/23 you could come to city hall when it is presented to us!!!!
Can you believe that I have something scheduled?!? City council is voting on a resolution for our research on girls! I don't know what time we will be do
5/23 I have a drs appt! Are you around this Sunday afternoon? It's my homework day but I want to see you. Also next Monday around 4:30 or 5 I am free.
Either is fine cause I am not back to teaching class yet
Yah! I will hit you up!
